testimonials.text: Just what I was looking for: This game is kid friendly, not a million ads getting in the way of game play, not so precise that a child's finger can't manipulate it. It has a variety of games with different graphics and fun themes. In the span of a few minutes I watch my kids improve at letter recognition or basic puzzles. I got the preschool and the toddler versions and love them both.
